channel.title: Issue in client
channel.description: Hey everyone I have this strange issue that happens only on one of my computers... Once I log into a server through a client that I download It runs perfectly. However when i move 2 times the client just shuts and nothing happens... Does anybody know how to fix this or what the issue is? It only happens on the second move... So on the second click it just shuts down... Hope someone can help me Thanks!

item.title: Issue in client
item.dc:creator: @fatmidget fatmidget
item.description:
@fatmidget wrote:

Hey everyone I have this strange issue that happens only on one of my computers… Once I log into a server through a client that I download It runs perfectly. However when i move 2 times the client just shuts and nothing happens… Does anybody know how to fix this or what the issue is? It only happens on the second move… So on the second click it just shuts down… Hope someone can help me
Thanks!
